params._initialOwner: Address that will own this contract

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Only for stuck funds, should never be needed in normal operation

returns._0: Minimum payment amount (defaults to 0.01 ARXO if not set)
True if nonce has been used

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payForAccess(string,uint256,bytes32,uint.details: Transfers ARXO from user and distributes with 70/10/10/10 split      Emits AccessPaid event for x402 protocol verification

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMinimumPayment(string,uint256).details: Only callable by owner (ArxOS LLC initially)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

PRICE_UPDATE_DELAY().notice: Delay before a price increase becomes effective (7 days)

applyPriceUpdate(string).notice: Apply a pending price update (public utility)

getMinimumPayment(string).notice: Get minimum payment for a building

isNonceUsed(bytes32).notice: Check if nonce has been used

minimumPayment(string).notice: Mapping from building ID to minimum payment amount

noncesUsed(bytes32).notice: Mapping from nonce to usage status (prevents replay)

pendingPriceUpdates(string).notice: Mapping from building ID to pending price update

setMinimumPayment(string,uint256).notice: Set minimum payment for a building
